common.invalid: You provided an invalid `{{label}}`. Please try again.
common.cancel: Respond with `cancel` to cancel the command.
common.time: The command will automatically be cancelled in {{time}}seconds.

infos.description: Disables a command or command group.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command or command group. Only administrators may use this command.

infos.description: Enables a command or command group.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command or command group. Only administrators may use this command.

infos.description: Lists all command groups.
infos.details: Only administrators may use this command.

infos.description: Loads a new command.
infos.details: The argument must be full name of the command in the format of `group:memberName`. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.

infos.description: Reloads a command or command group.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command or command group. Providing a command group will reload all of the commands in that group. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.

infos.description: Unloads a command.
infos.details: The argument must be the name/ID (partial or whole) of a command. Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.

infos.description: Displays a list of available commands, or detailed information for a specified command.
infos.details:
The command may be part of a command name or a whole command name.
If it isn't specified, all available commands will be listed.

help.help-description:
To run a command in {{guild}} use {{usage}}.
For exemple, {{example}}.

Use {{detail}} to view detailed information about a specific command.
Use {{all}} to view a list of *all* commands, not just available ones.

infos.description: Set the guild prefix
infos.details: If no prefix is provided, the current prefix will be shown. If the prefix is "default", the prefix will be reset to the bot's default prefix. If the prefix is "none", the prefix will be removed entirely, only allowing mentions to run commands. Only administrators may change the prefix.

infos.description: Get the bot's ping
Executes JavaScript code.
infos.details: Only the bot owner(s) may use this command.

infos.description: Get your, or a member experience
Get some useful information about the bot
infos.details: You can get information about the bot like for example his version, the amount of guild the bot is in, the amount of command than the bot manage, ...

infos.description: Check your actual rank into the server.

Set a role which will be automatically given.
infos.role: Which role do you want to give when a member join the guild?

onjoin-role.show-config: When a member join this guild he will automatically received those roles : {{roles}}
onjoin-role.no-role: The role {{role}} is not registered as a role to be given to a member when he joins the guild.
onjoin-role.removed: The role {{role}} will not longer be given to members when they join the guild.
